title: Business Analyst_Deepanshi_E
description:
Coders Brain is a global leader in its services, digital, and business solutions that partners with its clients to simplify, strengthen, and transform their businesses. We ensure the highest levels of certainty and satisfaction through a deep-set commitment to our clients, comprehensive industry expertise, and a global network of innovation and delivery centers.

Location: Bangalore (Work From Office)

Position: Permanent with Coders Brain Technology Pvt. Ltd.

Notice Period: 20 Days Maximum.

Experience- 4 + Yrs

Skill- Business Analyst

JD-

Responsible for documenting end to end requirements and solutions for the projects.


Responsible for gathering requirements and co-ordinate with team members, Client SMEs, business and other


stake holders to produce the impact analysis documents.


Providing initial estimates and contributed to high-level designs.
Get involvement in looking into defects along with SME Responsible for doing requirement traceability


against Low level designs. Moreover, test scripts to ensure everything is covered.


Communicate requirements with minimal direction and guidance.
Acts as the liaison between the business experts and the project team members
Facilitates business/functional requirement review, approval, and sign-off sessions
Implement industry best practices and recommend process changes to boost productivity, development.


Skills: it,business analyst,co-ordination
Show more
